mutants.code:
def restore_polycarp_sequence(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (n, b) = test_cases[i]
        x = 2
        y = 0
        ns = []
        for _ in range(n):
            if y == 0:
                ns.append(b[x - 1])
                y = 1
            else:
                ns.append(b[-x])
                x += 1
                y = 0
        results.append(ns)
    return results
